activities: Computer Information Technology Corporation and its subsidiaries (“CITC”) is a leading provider of software development and consulting services. It also offers its marketing automation application in a Software-as-a-Service model, licensed model and marketing services. CITC enters into licensing and service Agreements which include receiving and using data from clients for marketing purposes. Under some Agreements CITC’s clients use the data that is stored on our servers as they wish. Some Agreements allow CITC to use the data for marketing campaigns on behalf of their clients. These campaigns are approved by the clients prior to being deployed.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: IN-House and Eu data protection authorities
